short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly import testimonials across platforms with GoZen Testimonials, your ultimate Testimonials collection tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your Social Proof Collection

Elevate your testimonial gathering process with the GoZen Testimonials Chrome Extension. 

Say goodbye to the hassle of manual copying and pasting. Our extension empowers you to seamlessly import testimonials from hundreds of platforms with just a few clicks.

Key Features:

🗃️ Quick Import:
Effortlessly import testimonials from a wide array of websites in just two clicks.

💌 Collection Form:
Easily grab your text or video testimonial collection form to gather feedback from your customers.

🔍 Smart Filtering:
Search and filter for the most relevant approved testimonials to showcase your best customer feedback.

🪁 Versatile Sharing:
Share testimonials as images, widgets, or links across various platforms.

🤝 Team Collaboration:
Invite your entire team to access and manage every testimonial your business has collected.

📱 Social Media Savvy:
Seamlessly import content from major social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

💜 Review Platform Integration:
Tap into leading review platforms to gather valuable feedback and reviews.
